subject: Re: [junit] Re: jWebUnit
msgSnippet: ... Hope you are feeling better. Does [ServletRunner/ServletUnitClient].getSession( true ).getServletContext() not do the job for you?
messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Sep 2004 13:33:47 +0200, Ilja Preuss <preuss@...> wrote:
> I hit "Send" accidentally - I wanted to add an appology for the late
> response. I am regenerating from an arm fracture and wasn't at work the
> last two weeks.


Hope you are feeling better. Does
[ServletRunner/ServletUnitClient].getSession( true
).getServletContext() not do the job for you?
